title: Interpretation of a dream about red roses by Ibn Sirin and leading scholars

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about red roses: Seeing red roses in a dream carries many meanings and symbols, such as what translates to goodness and joy, and what brings sorrows and worries, and its interpretation differs in a dream of comfort for married and divorced people and men, and we will show. You will find the full details of the dream of red roses in a dream in this article.Interpretation of the dream of red rosesThe interpretation of the dream of red roses has many meanings and associations, namely: If a person sees red roses blooming in his dream and their appearance is beautiful, then he will receive good news and happy news in his life in the coming period. In While if a person sees a dead or wilted red rose in his dream, then he is in pleasant circumstances, which are not destined to be completed. If the fortuneteller is single and sees wilted red roses in her dream, this is a sign that she has entered into an unsuccessful business that will bring her problems. If a person sees in his dream a flower seller selling a large amount of red roses, then this dream is praiseworthy and indicates that he will reap a lot of material gains and raise his standard of living. Interpretation of a dream about red roses by Ibn SirinThe scholar Ibn Sirin explained many of the meanings and symbols related to seeing red roses in a dream, The most important of them are: If a sick person sees in his dream a red rose that looks wonderful and picks it, then this vision is not good and indicates that his death will soon approach. If one sees in a dream that he is inside a garden that contains many red roses with a pleasant scent, then he will begin a successful love relationship that will bring joy to His heart in the near future. Interpretation of a dream of red roses for a single woman. Interpretation of a dream of red roses for a single woman in a dream has many interpretations and meanings, the most important of which are: If the dreamer is single and sees red roses in her home, then this vision is very promising and indicates that she will meet a suitable life partner in the future. Nearby. An unrelated girl sees in her dream that a young man gives her a bouquet of red roses, this indicates the intensity of his love for her and his desire to marry her in reality. If a Virgo sees in her dream that many men give her red flowers, this is a clear indication of a large number Of the suitors for her engagement in the coming period. If a single woman dreams that her entire family carries red roses and gives them to each other, this is a clear indication of the bond, the warmth of the family, and the strength of the relationship that unites them in reality. Interpretation of a dream about red and white roses for a single womanIf the fortuneteller is single and saw white roses in In her dream, she will marry a loyal and respectable man who can make her happy and take care of her. According to the great scholar Ibn Sirin, if an unmarried girl sees a white rose in her dream, she will have success in all aspects of life, and benefits and blessings will come to her from where she does not marry. . He knows and does not calculate. Seeing the same girl picking white roses in the vision indicates the arrival of happy news and positive events in her life in the very near future. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream the appearance of red flowers at the right time.

He knows and does not calculate. Seeing the same girl picking white roses in the vision indicates the arrival of happy news and positive events in her life in the very near future. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream the appearance of red flowers at the right time.

title: I dreamed that my plug was coming out

preview.html: I dreamed that feces came out of me in a dream by seeing a stove roy2a.com. Feces from humans and animals are a natural thing that results from the digestion of food, but the dreamer may be surprised when he sees feces in a dream, so what does it appear and what does it mean? Today through this article we will present to you I dreamed that my plug was coming out in a dream from great interpreters such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir and other dream interpretation scholars. Follow us according to the condition of the dreamer, whether she is single, married, or pregnant. I dreamed that feces came out of me in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Shirin explained the merchant’s vision of the feces that came out in a dream. This indicates that he will make great profits and profits from his trade in the coming period. Seeing a student defecating in a dream indicates On the success and distinction that he will achieve in his scientific life. Excreting feces in a poor man’s dream indicates an improvement in his condition and circumstances for the better. Storing feces in the dream indicates that the dreamer is a good person who has good qualities and a good reputation among people. Seeing yourself walking on a chair in a dream indicates that the dreamer is taking A wrong and bad path in his life. Read also: Interpretation of seeing feces in a dream. I dreamed that feces came out of me in a dream. Al-Nabulsi interpreted seeing feces coming out in a dream. It indicates that the coming period of the dreamer’s life will be full of goodness and happiness. Seeing touching feces in a dream indicates his feeling of remorse for the words. The unkind thing he said in a moment of anger. Eating feces in a dream indicates that the viewer is obtaining money illegally. Throwing feces in a dream indicates that the viewer will face serious health problems in the coming days. Read also: Interpretation of seeing worms in feces in a dream: I dreamed that I got out of feces. In a dream by Ibn Shaheen, Ibn Shaheen explained that seeing feces that came out of the sea in a dream indicates that the viewer will be exposed to a major financial crisis in the coming period. Seeing a chair in the workplace in a dream indicates that the monarch has reached a prominent position and an important position in his work. Footstool in a dream, which is It indicates that the dreamer is far from his Lord and that he does many wrong things in his life. I dreamed that feces came out of me in a dream about single women. Seeing an unmarried woman defecating in a dream says that she will hear promising news about her life in the near future. Excreting feces on the ground in a woman’s dream. It indicates the end All the troubles and sorrows in her life. Seeing a single woman leaving a chair in her underwear in a dream says that she is an unreliable girl and does not trust those around her. I dreamed that feces came out of me in a dream about a married woman. Seeing a married woman defecating in a dream shows that the coming period of her life will be full of goodness and happiness. Collecting feces in a married woman’s dream announces that she is a woman of good reputation and beloved among men. Seeing a married woman’s feces in a dream indicates that she will announce pregnancy soon, and God knows best. Read also: Interpretation of seeing feces in a dream. I dreamed that I passed feces in a dream about a pregnant woman. Seeing a pregnant woman defecating in The dream indicates that she will soon undergo the delivery process

title: Interpretation of a dream about a closed window

preview.html: Seeing a window in a dream has many interpretations depending on its condition, whether it is open or closed, large or small, and so on. We present all of this in the following lines by leading translators and scholars, men and women. Interpretation of seeing a closed window in a dream: A closed window in a dream is a sign of separation and distance. It also indicates sadness, anxiety, and tension until one sees something. Perhaps it indicates an introvert who wants to meet others. Seeing a net in a dream by Ibn Sirin: Seeing a window in The dream, as interpreted by Ibn Sirin, is evidence that hear the good news. Whoever sees himself looking out of a window in a dream symbolizes that he is an ambitious person with great desires. Seeing himself looking out of a window into something dark or scary is a symbol of hearing bad news. A broken window in a dream indicates disappointment and failure. A dream Falling from the window is a symbol of the deterioration of the dreamer's financial condition. Seeing an open window in a dream is a symbol of the beginning of a new project. Seeing the sea from the net means traveling. The meaning of seeing an open window by Ibn Shahin Ibn Shaheen interpreted an open window in a dream as good in romantic relationships. As indicated by ample food and good luck An open window is a symbol of a fair woman with a good reputation. Seeing a woman going out of a window. Openness indicates escaping from dealing with the situation. If one dreams that he is entering his house from his window, this is a sign of managing his affairs. Interpretation of seeing a window in a dream for a single woman. When a girl dreams that she is opening the window, she is talking To someone about her engagement. An open window is a sign of kindness and food. It is also indicated by a marriage. If you see her, do it. Close the window. It is a sign of breaking off the engagement. The meaning of seeing a closed window in a dream for a married woman. See the closed window. In a dream of a married woman, it is a sign of a journey. The absence of her husband. An open window symbolizes a happy event The net in her dream is a symbol of procreation. The meaning of seeing a window in a dream for a pregnant woman. The window in a pregnant woman’s dream symbolizes giving birth. If it is closed, it indicates the difficulty of childbirth. If it is open, it indicates female birth and ease of delivery. Interpretation of seeing a closed window in a dream for a man. The man who dreams of it, looking outside the window, announces the good news. It also symbolizes his approach to achieving his ambitions. A closed window symbolizes disappointment and failure. The meaning of seeing a broken window in a dream. A broken window in a dream is a symbol of your doubt. It also indicates the viewer’s extreme confusion about something. Add the dream that you would like to interpret by referring to the social situation in a comment below the article. We will answer it and explain it.

title: Interpretation of a dream about a balloon according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a balloon according to Ibn Sirin. Balloons are a kind of cheap children's toys, but the happiness they bring to a child's heart when they see them is very great, and they are not exclusive to children only, but they are among the things that adults love as well, so they are a decoration of homes and places in many days and are a kind of expression of happiness and celebration. And seeing it in a dream has connotations and signs. Interpretation of a dream about a balloon in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Seeing a balloon in a dream has interpretations, including what is related to it, whether it is inflated or not, or will it explode or will explode in a dream, and the interpretation of a dream about a balloon in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The sleeper who sees the balloon Inflated in his dream shows his bad psychological state, the great pressure he is exposed to, and the responsibilities accumulated on him. While seeing a balloon bursting in a dream, it symbolizes that the viewer is an optimistic person and lives happily. Also, a balloon in a dream is a symbol of the arrogance that the fortuneteller characterizes, but if he sees that this If the balloon was flying in the air, this indicates how much he wants to achieve it and will achieve it. On the other hand, a woman playing with a balloon in her dream symbolizes the good times she is experiencing but also symbolizes the coming goodness of her home. Also playing with a balloon and throwing it high in the sky in a dream The dreamer symbolizes that he is doing some adventure in his life. See also: Interpretation of the dream of seeing an amusement park in a dream in detail. Balloon code in a dream for single people. The balloon in the fortune teller’s dream contains many symbols, so balloons, according to their sizes and colors, are also interpreted in the dream. The symbol of the balloon in a woman’s dream Single woman. Blowing a balloon in a dream indicates that she will reach her goal that she wants to reach soon, in addition to good news and good news for her and her family. The white balloon in her dream indicates the calm she is experiencing and family happiness, while the bursting of the balloon symbolizes the difficulties that are passing The white balloon in her dream also symbolizes the kindness of her heart, which she enjoys. Also, the balloons in the girl’s dream are among the good dreams and good things that await her. While the red balloon in her dream symbolizes that she is in an emotional relationship or about to enter into a relationship. Watching A group of balloons flying in the air indicates that she will get money soon. Interpretation of a dream about a pink balloon for single people: Seeing pink balloons in a single woman’s dream symbolizes that she is in a relationship. On the other hand, seeing these balloons flying in the air or exploding during her sleep warns her of the possibility of a Conflicts within her relationship. Seeing an inflated balloon in this color also warns her not to reciprocate the feeling she feels towards the person she loves because it will hurt her. While seeing the balloon being inflated pink, it symbolizes that he is in a love relationship in which he is being cheated on. See also: Interpretation of the dream To see a balloon in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about a balloon for married couples. As we know that balloons have different colors in nature, and this is reflected in the interpretation of

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a mouse in a dream for a single woman married to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a mouse in a dream: The mouse is considered one of the animals that belong to the rodent family and it is very harmful. The Messenger, may God bless him and grant him peace, ordered it to be killed. Because they destroy property and spoil food and fodder. In this article, we talk about the interpretation of the dream of seeing a mouse in a dream. Seeing a mouse in a dream for a married woman. Dream interpretation scholars have unanimously agreed that seeing a mouse in a dream for a married woman is one of the disturbing dreams accompanied by bad interpretations, and God knows best. Among the most famous sayings of commentators is that seeing a mouse in a dream for a married woman is what The following: If a married woman sees a small mouse in a dream, this means that there are problems with her husband and they will worsen and increase significantly in the coming period. Seeing a married woman with many mice in a dream means the abundance of sustenance and money that the dreamer gains from various sources, whether from work or Inheritance. Seeing black mice also indicates the lies and deception that this woman uses in relationships with those around her to get rid of difficulties. If a married woman sees a white mouse in a dream, this is a sign that she is not good at dealing with those around her. If a married woman sees in a dream That there is a group of cats chasing a mouse, this is evidence of the collapse of the problems surrounding them in the life of the fortuneteller, and if she dreams that she has caught a mouse, this is a sign that she will be harmed by her enemies. Seeing a mouse in a dream is for a man, unlike a woman, seeing a mouse in a dream is often A man is a promising dream, according to dream interpreters, including the researcher Ibn Sirin. Next, we consider the interpretation of a man dreaming of a mouse in a dream: If one sees in his dream that he begins to beat the mouse with his hand until it kills it. This indicates that he is comfortable with what he is going through in the current period of economic crisis and that God Almighty is providing him with His bounty. However, if a person sees in his dream that a mouse is trying to bite him several times but is unable to harm him, this indicates that he is going through a financial crisis or a health crisis. But it passes quickly without being harmed, and God Almighty is higher and knows better. See also: How to know the location of the mouse and the best things that repel mice. Interpretation of a dream about a small mouse. There are different interpretations given by scientists about seeing a small mouse, which differ from one person to another as it could be just illusions and not reality. And in the interpretation of a dream about a small mouse, the following is: Seeing a small mouse in general in the interpreters’ dream in a young man’s dream is evidence that the presence of a woman with bad qualities is trying hard to trap him and attract him to become attached to her. If a young man dreams that he is making a mousetrap, this is a sign that this person is trying He tried hard to deceive that lady into committing an indecency with her, so he repents to God Almighty. For a young man to see in his dream that he is working to kill a small mouse, this is a sign that he will get rid of all the problems and sorrows that he is experiencing and will achieve his dreams and ambitions. See also: What is the interpretation of a dream about a son? Seeing a mouse bite in a dream and what does it indicate? Seeing a mouse in a dream for a married man: A man can see dreams in a dream, some of which are disturbing and some of which are disturbing.

title: Interpretation of a dream about being hit with a hand or a stick in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of seeing being beaten with the hand or with a stick in a dream by Ibn Sirin. We present to you on the Moments website what is new and distinctive in this article, the interpretation of the dream of seeing being beaten with the hand, the interpretation of the dream of seeing being beaten with the stick, the interpretation of the dream of being beaten, being beaten in a dream has many interpretations and connotations, and the interpreters differed. In the interpretation of the dream of being beaten with a stick, so that some scholars can learn more about the interpretation of the dream of seeing being beaten by hand, the interpretation of the dream of being beaten can be found on our website. You can see:Interpretation of the dream of seeing chocolateInterpretation of the dream of being beaten in a dream Whoever sees that he is hitting another person’s head with something crooked, he will hit him. With what harms him. Likewise with the whip, stick, or whatever is on the head and the like. Jabir al-Maghribi said: “Whoever sees that someone has hit him and does not know who hit him and what led to the beating, then he will take goodness and money and wear new clothes.” If he fears stoning, he will be safe from what he fears. Al-Kirmani said: “Whoever sees that they are beating him with whips until their signs appear on him and blood flows from him, then if he is imprisoned or chained, he will hit him with his tongue.” He will get what he hates and be rewarded for, and if that is not the case, then he will get money, goods, and clothes that will show its effect on him. Some commentators said: Beating is a supplication, so whoever sees that he is hitting someone, question him. Some commentators said, perhaps the dream of hitting, if a person does it with his hand or on his command, indicates judgment and management of matters. Abu Saeed Al-Waez said: As for hitting, it is better for the one who hit him with the hand of the hitter, and if he sees him hitting him with a stick It turns out that it improves it. . And this is not enough for him. Whoever dreams that a man hits him on the head with a hammer and berries on his head and his mark remains, then he wants his boss to leave. If it hits him on the eyelid of his eyes, he intends to go against his religion, and if his lips are plucked from his eyelids, then he calls for heresy. And if he hits His skull, his expression has ended and the attacker has achieved his goal. And if he hits his earlobe and blood comes out of it, he hits the victim’s daughter. Whoever dreams of being beaten with whips without tying his hands and feet, whether blood came out or not, it is forbidden property. Especially if his body is stained with blood, and if he was beaten A mark on his body, he benefits from everyone to the extent of this, especially if the one who hit him is known. Whoever dreams of hitting him without a whip and the mark of the beating remains, then it is good, and if no trace remains, then it is a reason. Interpretation of a dream about beating a dead person: whoever sees that he hit the dead person and the dead person merely hit him indicates good. The condition of the dead in the afterlife. A dream about beating a dead person: Ismail bin Al-Ash’ath said: Whoever sees that he hits a dead person will benefit him on the journey or return to his hand what he lost from him. And if he hits a dead person, it indicates an increase in his debt and the fulfillment of his debt. And whoever sees that he hits him while he is folded He said bad words and regretted the evil. If he sees that he is being beaten and does not see, then it is better as long as he is not tied up or oppressed. Whoever dreams that an angel hits him with something other than wood, it covers him, and if he hits him on the back, he pays his debt. And if he hits him on the back, he will marry him, and if Hitting him with a stick will cause him something he hates. It has been said that hitting indicates change, and perhaps it indicates preaching. Ibn Sirin and the commentators said: It is good to see beating in a dream. In this paragraph we are talking about Ibn Sirin, and the commentators said that it is good to see beating in a dream in detail in e.

title: Interpretation of a doctor in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a doctor in a dream, because many people are obsessed with the fear of illness and the desire to always be healthy and strong, and it is said that seeing a doctor in a dream generally denotes wisdom, justice, correction, and reform. The interpretation of seeing a doctor in a dream is generally to be wise, or Recovering from physical ailments, good behavior or seeking knowledge and self-development, but the situation in which the dreamer is in a dream has a factor and interpretation of the vision on it. It varies depending on the position of the dreamer and the meaning and details of the dream. Therefore, during our article today, we will shed light on the interpretation of the doctor in the dream for pregnant, single, married women and for men, and at the same time the type of doctor in the dream, is it a dentist, a gynecologist, or the woman’s clinic itself? A detailed encyclopedia If If an unmarried girl saw a doctor in her dream, it means that she will enjoy success and happiness, whether on the academic or practical level. Also, a dream about an unmarried girl who has never married a doctor before indicates that she will soon marry a good man with good morals and good characteristics and enjoy a happy and peaceful life. Seeing a doctor in a dream for a married woman, according to Ibn Sirin. If the dreamer is married and sees a doctor in her dream, this means a lot of good and abundant food on her way. Also, seeing a doctor in a married woman’s dream is a sign of her husband and that their life is calm and blessed with stability and love. The appearance of the husband in the form of a doctor In a married woman’s dream, it indicates that her husband earns a lot of money, but this is permissible. Also, seeing a doctor in a dream for a married woman is a sign that she will get rid of problems, difficulties, and worries. The presence of a doctor in a pregnant woman’s dream with Ibn Sirin indicates that this woman will give birth to a healthy and healthy child that every father and every mother desires. It also indicates that God answered the prayer of that pregnant woman to obtain the fetus that Seeing a dentist in a dream: Seeing a dentist in a girl, whether she is married, pregnant, single, or a man in something, but also the type of doctor, whether male or female in something, does not differ, and in general, the dentist in it. It symbolizes a happy and peaceful life full of kindness, love, success and many achievements and wishes. Having a dentist in anyone’s dream is a great indicator that there is someone close to him who gives him a lot of love and attention and is his partner in all his good and bad moments. A lot of good feelings between them. Seeing a gynecologist in a dream. The interpretation varies if the dreamer is a man or a woman. If the dreamer here is a man, then

title: Seeing wheat in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen

preview.html: Wheat in a dream: Wheat in a dream is considered one of the good things that indicates that the dreamer will gain enormous blessings and benefits in his life and will achieve with diligence in work and perseverance in the dreams and wishes that he made for himself and he will reach security as he wants. The elite interpretation scholars believe that a dream about wheat means an increase in the diet and the dreamer will gain a lot of money soon, God willing, and in the following paragraphs is a detailed presentation of the information that the interpreters told us. Seeing wheat in a dream...so follow usWheat in a dreamSeeing wheat in a dream means a lot to the pioneer and that he will obtain abundant money in his life. If the dreamer sees wheat in the dream, this means that his financial conditions will improve a lot in the coming period and God will help him until he achieves his ambitions and desires. If he sees The dreamer sees wheat falling from his hand in a dream, this means that the dreamer is a spendthrift who does not care about his hopes and is wasting them on useless things. When an unmarried young man sees wheat in a dream, this means that God will open the doors of goodness for him and give him a good wife who loves him and wants to live with him in peace and preserve On his house and children, if he wishes. Machine. If the dreamer suffers from many problems in his life and sees wheat in his dream, this means that he will emerge from these crises and God will help him overcome the difficulties and achieve peace of mind and stability in life. Which will happen soon for him and he will be very happy about it. If the dreamer sees a harvest of wheat, this means that he will get rid of the worries that he suffered from for a while and will return to life and do his work better, God willing. For unmarried women to dream of harvesting wheat means that she will soon hear happy news. title: Interpretation of seeing a keyhole in a dream

preview.html: I like fans subscribers fans Interpretation of seeing a keyhole in a dream by Ibn Sirin, indicates the dreamer who spies on others, while seeing people peeking at the dreamer symbolizes their desire to know all his affairs. Finding a golden key in a single person's dream portends an upcoming marriage. Overlooking a dream to spy on the difference in the door is a sign of his betrayal of a person he trusts. The vision symbolizes the presence of friends who act around the dreamer. Seeing yourself looking through a hole in a dream warns that you are unintentionally hurting someone. The entrance door in a dream If the dreamer sees that the door of his house is broken, this is a warning against revealing private secrets to others. Seeing a woman warns of getting married Others follow her news with her husband and try to spoil their relationship together. The vision indicates the need to think about correcting many things that the dreamer does by chance. Interpretation of a dream about cutting the house key in a dream Cutting the key in a dream warns of something unpleasant that will happen to the visionary. The vision indicates the obstacles that delay the dreamer's achievement of his goals. The vision portends a delay in answering prayers, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a key and a door in a dream The vision indicates the need to make the right decision to succeed in work. The vision shows the dreamer's good luck and also expresses the important opportunities that will be available to him. The vision symbolizes an easy solution to all problems. To open a door with a key in a dream, it is a sign of kindness And the livelihood that fills the house. The dream of an unmarried woman indicates the approaching date of her engagement. See also: - Interpretation of a dream of a key in a dream by Ibn Sirin Interpretation of a dream of a key for a married woman Seeing a married woman carrying a key in a dream indicates the stability of her family life and the success of her relationship with her husband. Searching for a key in a dream is a sign of moving to a new house or buying a car. The key symbolizes in a dream for a married woman her good behavior among people and her high position in their hearts. Holding a key indicates that she feels comfortable and comfortable with her husband. Giving a key in a dream to someone is a statement of the expenses and the wages due to the unmarried woman. If a married woman sees that her husband gives her a key in a dream, this indicates the stability of her financial situation. Interpretation of a dream looking through a peephole He searches for me and it indicates the bad morals of her vision. The vision shows the dreamer's love for knowing the secrets of others. Seeing people looking through a peephole indicates that people are trying to follow his news and reveal his secrets. Interpretation of a dream of a key for a single woman An unmarried girl who receives a key in a dream indicates a change in her situation for the better. The vision indicates a new stage, and making friends And learn many cultures. After that, seeing the search for the key in a dream for an unmarried woman symbolizes her desire to get out of the circle that shortens her. The vision shows the remarkable progress of the girl, whether in her studies or in her work. I got a new key in a dream, announcing celibacy and moving to her home with her husband. After that, seeing an iron key in a dream means marrying a man who will give her the support she needs to advance in life.

title: What is the interpretation of seeing incense in a dream according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Seeing incense in a dream is one of the visions that indicate a lot of good and abundant food, as we know that incense has many fragrant smells that perfume the place, and some may use it to get rid of the envy that afflicts him and his family. Seeing incense in a dream The interpretation of seeing incense in a dream indicates getting rid of the eye of envy and haters, and if a person dreams that he is inhaling incense and its smell is good, this means that he hears a lot of happy news that changes his life for the better. When a person sees that he is smoking the place, this is one of the visions that show that he is a twentieth person and loves to talk a lot with people from all classes, and it is also evidence of his modesty. Seeing incense in a dream by Ibn Sirin If the dreamer is among his competitors with one of his relatives and sees incense in a dream, these differences can be resolved and there will be peace between them and a good life full of all good things. When the dreamer sees that he is smoking himself with incense, this is one of the visions that indicate the good reputation that people know him for, and the vision also shows the good words that were said in his absence. The dream of the exhaust in a dream indicates that the dreamer will enjoy a life of luxury and prosperity. To interpret your dream Accurately and quickly, search Google for the interpretation of dreams online. Seeing incense in a dream for a single woman If an unmarried girl of marriageable age sees frankincense in a dream, this indicates that her marriage to a wealthy young man, of good character, and a good reputation among people is approaching. If a girl sees that she is smoking incense and smelling it, and feels happy and comfortable, this indicates the good news that will come to her soon and will be suitable to bring joy to her heart. When a girl sees in a dream the type of incense she prefers, this indicates the kind words that others say about her, as she enjoys the love of people and their strong desire to get closer to her. Seeing incense in a dream for a married woman A married woman who sees incense in a dream is blessed news and many good things that she will receive in the near future, and if she suffers from some disagreements with her husband and his family and sees in a dream that she is lighting incense, then all problems will end and she will enjoy peace. If a woman sees in a dream that she is fumigating her house with incense, she will achieve the goals that she has been striving for for a long time. Seeing incense in a dream for a pregnant woman Seeing a pregnant woman in a dream burning incense in general means that she gave birth easily without problems and problems, and if She saw that she was lighting incense, then she will soon end all the problems she is suffering from. If a pregnant woman sees that she is perfumed with incense and it smells good, then she is blessed with a male child, and the vision also shows the good position that her son will have in the future. When a pregnant woman sees someone smoking it, this is an indication of his weight, which will support her and her son after birth. Seeing incense in a dream about a man If the dreamer suffers from worries and problems and is struck by the evil eye and sees incense in a dream and its smell fills the place, this indicates that he will soon be freed from the envy and malice of some of those close to him.
